title: The One Where Monica Gets a Roommate
plot: Rachel Green, a runaway bride, seeks out her childhood friend Monica Geller and moves in with her in New York City.

conversations.said: There's nothing to tell! It's just some guy I work with!
Come on! You're going out with the guy! There's gotta be something wrong with him!
Alright Joey, be nice. So does he have a hump? A hump and a hairpiece?
Wait, does he eat chalk?
I just don't want her to go through what I went through with Carl.
Okay, everybody relax. This is not even a date. It's just two people going out to dinner and not having sex.
Sounds like a date to me.
I guess we’re not sitting together anymore.

title: The One with the Sonogram at the End
plot: Ross finds out that his ex-wife Carol is pregnant with his child, and Rachel struggles with returning her engagement ring to Barry.

conversations.said: Guess what, guess what, guess what!
The fifth dentist caved and now they’re all recommending Trident?
You don’t get a lot of ‘doy’ these days...
I can’t believe I have to return my ring to Barry today. I feel like I'm breaking up with him all over again.
Oh, sure, what’s one more thing for Ross to be worried about? I mean, it’s not like he’s already going to be a father or anything.
You guys can spoil all the fun, but I’m happy for you, Ross. You’re going to be a great dad.

title: The One with the Thumb
plot: Phoebe gets a bank error in her favor and struggles with keeping the money, while Chandler starts smoking again.

conversations.said: Guess what!
The fifth dentist caved and now they're all recommending Trident?
No! I got $500 in my bank account by mistake! And then they sent me a football phone to apologize!
You got free money? And a phone? I want to live in your world!
Well, you know, you don’t really expect to find a thumb in a soda can...
What are you talking about?
Phoebe found a thumb in her soda can! And now the soda company is paying her $7,000!
You won $7,000 for finding a thumb? I’ve been drinking the wrong sodas!
